minor copy editing, please revert if felt best
clean up, typos fixed: Divison → Division using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
/* Vimy Memorial */ Note about crowd size
/* Battle in the air */ Fragmented sentence
/* 9 April */ add citation for attack delay. Will use an academic ref when I find one
/* 10 April */ is "on" better" than the comma
/* Tactical plan */ suggestion - I think this is better
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
/* 9 April */ War memorial is built on Hill 145
/* German defences */ Conversion; "all but" used in 2 sentences in a row
/* Influence on Canada */ Active voice; quote needed an introduction
/* Influence on Canada */ Without quotes, this sentence is a copy violation!
/* External links */ Use DNS name for external link
/* Tactical plan */ Verb tense; active voice
/* Battle in the air */ can. english
/* Artillery */ Link; convert to active voice
/* Preliminary attack */ Convert to active voice
/* Battle in the air */ Convert to active voice; POV
/* Trench raiding */ By the Canadians for Germans? (Convert to active voice)
Fixing reference errors and moving refs out of templates
/* German defences */ WP: MOSNUM section Numbers
/* Underground operations */ link to tunnel warfare and Mining (military)
/* Trench raiding */ non-breaking space; verb tense
